Libra Checker
About

About

Libra Checker is a Libra cryptocurrency block explorer.

The mission of Libra Checker is to create access for the general public to read data from the Libra Blockchain in a simple and effortless way.

With the help of Libra Checker, users can find information about Libra transactions, addresses, metadata, and in the future - Libra smart contracts data.

Libra Checker is a privacy-focused service. Besides Google Analytics with IP anonymization, we do not use any trackers or cookies. We do not collect any personal information about website users.

Libra Checker is currently running on the latest Libra blockchain testnet.

Follow and fork Libra Checker on Twitter and GitHub.

To check address balance and transactions:

  • Enter the address in Libra Checker's search field.
  • Use a direct link: https://librachecker.com/address/ADDRESS

To check transaction details:

  • Enter the transaction's ID (e.g. 1786) in Libra Checker's search field.
  • Use a direct link: https://librachecker.com/transaction/TRANSACTION

Development

Libra is an open payments ecosystem that actively invites and encourages third-party developers to build products and services around the Libra Blockchain.

The Libra currency is built on the “Libra Blockchain.” Because it is intended to address a global audience, the software that implements the Libra Blockchain is open source — designed so that anyone can build on it, and billions of people can depend on it for their financial needs.
— Libra White Paper

According to the white paper, Facebook will have similar rights to Libra as any other member of the Libra Association.

Libra is not supposed to be a commercial trademark. To register it as a trademark and to restrict its use would be against Libra's Mission and Vision. Furthermore, it would be close to impossible to protect Libra as a commercial trademark, because both the wordmark and the symbol are generic, something you would expect to be in the public domain. Even the Libra symbol ≋ is just a generic character.

Libra Checker is an independent project created by Libra Startup. It is not affiliated with Facebook.

Currently, Libra Checker is in the early beta stage. It will continue improving to track millions (or billions) of Libra transactions from the upcoming Libra live network. The planned launch for the Libra mainnet is for the 2-nd half of 2020.

Open Source

Libra Checker is open source and it also has a tutorial.

/libra-chekcer - Frontend Vue.js app
/libra-chekcer-grpc - Backend gRPC client
/libra-checker-api - Express.js app to connect backend-frontend

Thanks to the Libra open-source developers community for their work and help.

A project by Libra Startup
